file.name: stukken.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Kadaster - BRK-Bevragen API - Stukken endpoints
  description: |
                De definitie van de Stukken endpoints en HAL components
  version: "1.5.0"
paths:
  /stukken/{stukIdentificatie}:
    get:
      operationId: GetStuk
      description: |
                    Raadplegen van een stuk. In een akte (stuk) zijn meerdere rechtsfeiten (stukdelen) vastgelegd.
      parameters:
        - $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/parameters/expand"
        - $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/parameters/fields"
        - in: path
          name: stukIdentificatie
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            maxLength: 60
      responses:
        '200':
          description: |
                        Zoekactie geslaagd
          headers:
            api-version:
              $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/headers/api_version"
            warning:
              $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/headers/warning"
          content:
            application/hal+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/StukHal'
        '400':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/400"
        '401':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/401"
        '403':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/403"
        '404':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/404"
        '406':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/406"
        '500':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/500"
        '503':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/503"
      tags:
      - Stukken
  /stukdelen/{stukdeelIdentificatie}:
    get:
      operationId: GetStukdeel
      description: |
                    Raadplegen van een stukdeel. In een akte (stuk) zijn meerdere rechtsfeiten (stukdelen) vastgelegd.
                    Met de stukdeel-identificaties kunnen gegevens over het stukdeel worden opgevraagd.
      parameters:
        - $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/parameters/fields"
        - $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/parameters/expand"
        - in: path
          name: stukdeelIdentificatie
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            maxLength: 60
      responses:
        '200':
          description: |
                        Zoekactie geslaagd
          headers:
            api-version:
              $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/headers/api_version"
            warning:
              $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/headers/warning"
          content:
            application/hal+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/StukdeelHal'
        '400':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/400"
        '401':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/401"
        '403':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/403"
        '404':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/404"
        '406':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/406"
        '500':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/500"
        '503':
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/responses/503"
      tags:
      - Stukken
components:
  schemas:
    StukdeelHalBasis:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "domain.yaml#/components/schemas/Stukdeel"
        - properties:
            _links:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/StukdeelLinks"
    StukdeelHal:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/StukdeelHalBasis"
        - properties:
            _embedded:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/StukdeelEmbedded"
    StukdeelLinks:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        self:
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/schemas/HalLink"
        stuk:
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/schemas/HalLink"
    StukdeelEmbedded:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        stuk:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/StukHalBasis"
    StukHalBasis:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "domain.yaml#/components/schemas/Stuk"
        - properties:
            _links:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/StukLinks"
    StukHal:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/StukHalBasis"
        - properties:
            _embedded:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/StukEmbedded"
    StukLinks:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        self:
          $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/schemas/HalLink"
        stukdelen:
          type: "array"
          items:
            $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VNG-Realisatie/Haal-Centraal-common/v1.2.0/api-specificatie/common.yaml#/components/schemas/HalLink"
    StukEmbedded:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        stukdelen:
          type: "array"
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/StukdeelHalBasis"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "StukEmbedded": parse schema: property "stukdelen": parse schema: item: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/StukdeelHalBasis": parse schema: allOf: [0]: parse schema: resolve "domain.yaml#/components/schemas/Stukdeel": external "domain.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
